title.en: The Destroyer Fell in Love with Me

altTitles.ko: 파멸 예정 연하 남주가 내게 빠졌다

altTitles.ko-ro: Pamyeol Yejyeong Yeonha Namjuga Naege Bbajyeossda

altTitles.en: The Younger Male Lead Fell for Me Before the Destruction

altTitles.de: Der Zerstörer hat sich in mich verliebt

altTitles.fr: Le destructeur s'est épris de moi

altTitles.pt-br: O desgraçado se apaixonou por mim

altTitles.ja: 破滅予定の年下主人公がワタシに夢中

description.de: Aus einem Fehler entsteht eine aufregende und intensive Liebesgeschichte! Am Tag, nachdem sie endlich all die Schulden ihres Studienkredits abbezahlt hat, wacht Amelia auf und findet heraus, dass sie in einen Roman reinteleportiert wurde, den sie liebt… als Tochter eines Grafen, der solch hohe Schulden hat, dass en ein Leben lang dauern wird, sie zu begleichen! Sie geht zu einer Kneipe, um ihre Sorgen im Alkohol zu ertränken, aber letztendlich verbringt sie betrunken die Nacht mit Herzog Kyle, einem Mann, der auf dem schnellsten Weg zur Selbstzerstörung ist. Sie versucht vor dem Herzog und seinem berüchtigten Ruf zu entkommen… Wird Amelia dazu in der Lage sein, das Schicksal zu ändern und dieser Liebesgeschichte ein glüchliches Ende zu geben?
description.en:
I spent a carefree day lounging about after paying off my tuition loans, but ended waking up inside a novel as the Amel, the only daughter of a poor count! Even if I worked for the rest of my life, the debt my family accumulated is too much for me to even be able to pay off! Not only that, but it seems that I ended up having a one-night experience with Kyle, the Male Lead, unknowingly after getting stupid drunk! I tried running away from him but he became way too attached to me. Will I be able to change the fate of my and my family's situation into an ending with a peaceful life with love?

---
Out of one mistake erupts an exciting and intense romance story! The day after finally paying off all of her student debts, Amelia wakes up to find that she has been teleported into a novel she loves … But as the daughter of a count who has the kind of debt that takes one’s whole life to pay off.

She heads to a bar to drink away her sorrows, but ends up drunkenly spending the night with Duke Kylian Chaield, a man on the fast track to self-destruction. She tries to get away from the Duke and his notorious reputation… But will Amelia be able to change fate and give this love story a happy ending?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Ecomix](https://www.ecomix.com/node/58829), [Lezhin](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/to_be_ruined), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/1180010861)  
**Official English Translation:** [Comikey](https://comikey.com/comics/the-destroyer-fell-in-love-with-me-webtoon/508/), [Lezhin](https://www.lezhin.com/en/comic/destroyerfellinlove), [NetComics](https://www.netcomics.com/comic/372)
description.fr:
Après avoir finalement remboursé tous ses prêts étudiants, Amelia s'est réveillée dans le monde de son roman préféré! Mais quel caprice de destin! Même dans ce monde, elle a toujours face à un destin de dettes... Seul l'alcool pourra lui consoler. Elle décide alors de noyer son chagrin dans l'alcool!

Se réveillant le lendemain, elle découvre qu'elle a passé la nuit avec le duc Kyle! Elle le connaît, car elle l'a déjà vu dans le roman! Et elle sait également qu'il sera le général qui dirigera la prochaine guerre mondiale.

Au début, elle essaie de s'échapper au duc et à sa réputation notoire, mais il est de plus en plus obsédé par elle! Parviendra-t-elle à accomplir à la fois l'amour et la paix dans ce monde du roman?
description.id: Keluar dari satu kesalahan meletuskan kisah asmara yang menarik dan intens! Sehari setelah akhirnya melunasi semua hutang mahasiswanya, Amelia bangun dan menyadari bahwa dia telah diteleportasi ke dalam novel yang dia sukai... Tetapi sebagai putri seorang bangsawan yang memiliki sejumlah hutang yang jika ingin dilunasi, maka orang itu harus bekerja selama sisa hidupnya. Dia menuju ke sebuah bar untuk minum demi meredam kesedihannya, namun akhirnya malah mabuk dan menghabiskan malam dengan Duke Kyle, seorang pria penghancur. Amelia mencoba untuk menjauh dari Duke dan reputasinya yang terkenal… Tapi apakah Amelia bisa mengubah nasib dan memberikan kisah yang berakhir bahagia?
description.ko:
하룻밤 실수로 시작된 강력한 러브펀치!

학자금 대출을 모두 갚고 자유를 누린지 단 하루. 
눈 떠보니 소설 속 가난한 백작가의 외동딸 아멜이 되어있었다! 
게다가 평생 일해도 못 갚을 정도의 빚이라니?! 
아멜이 된 그녀는 상실감에 술을 마시다 이 세계를 파멸로 이끌 남주 카일과 하룻밤을 보내게 된다. 
카일에게서 도망치려 하지만 그의 집요한 애정 공세는 상상 이상.
정해진 파멸 루트를 바뀌기 위해 고군분투하는 아멜은 새로운 엔딩으로 사랑과 세계평화를 모두 이룰 수 있을까?
description.pt-br: Um dia depois de finalmente pagar todas as suas dívidas estudantis, Amelia acorda e descobre que foi teletransportada para um livro que adora... Mas como filha de um conde endividado até os dentes.  Ela então vai até um bar, tentar afogar as mágoas na bebida, mas acaba passando a noite bêbada com o duque Kylian Chaield, um homem a caminho da própria autodestruição. Ela tenta fugir do duque e de sua infame reputação... Mas será que Amelia conseguirá ser capaz de mudar o destino e dar um final feliz a esta história de amor?
description.zh: 因一夜失身，而开始的爱情爆击！ 刚刚还完助学贷款，重获自由的她，居然就穿越到书中，成了小说里破落伯爵家的贫困千金阿梅莉亚·黛安！ 不仅如此，她还背负了一辈子都还不完的债？！ 借酒消愁的她，竟然和书里毁灭世界的男主凯里安发生了一夜情。不管如何挣扎，想从凯里安身边离开居然难于登天！凯里安对阿梅莉亚展开疯狂追求攻势，而在这世界孤军奋斗的阿梅莉亚·最后能否改变破灭剧情，实现爱情和平双丰收呢？
description.zh-hk: 因一夜失身，而開始的愛情爆擊！ 剛剛還完助學貸款，重獲自由的她，居然就穿越到書中，成了小說裡沒落伯爵家的貧困千金阿梅莉亞·黛安！ 不僅如此，她還揹負了一輩子都還不完的債？！ 借酒消愁的她，竟然和書裡毀滅世界的男主凱利安發生了一夜情。不管如何掙扎，想從凱利安身邊離開居然難如登天！凱利安對阿梅莉亞展開瘋狂追求攻勢，而在這世界孤軍奮鬥的阿梅莉亞，最後能否改變破滅劇情，實現愛情和平雙豐收呢？
